description: Create a Website With AI - a powerful tool with web hosting
title: UiMagic
introduction: UiMagic is an AI-powered website builder that offers quick and effortless website creation with advanced AI technology. It provides features like generating compelling content, hosting services, and an easy-to-use drag-and-drop builder. Customers praise UiMagic for its intuitive and impressive AI capabilities.
features: Quick And Effortless Copy: Generate compelling content in seconds
Hosting: Ensure website stays live and accessible
Easy to use builder: Design websites effortlessly with drag-and-drop feature
pricing: Free for Basics plan, $29/month for Advanced plan

faqs.question: What features does UiMagic offer?
faqs.answer: UiMagic offers features like quick content generation, hosting services, and an easy-to-use website builder.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, UiMagic offers a free Basics plan for users to try out.

faqs.question: What is the pricing for UiMagic's Advanced plan?
faqs.answer: The Advanced plan of UiMagic is priced at $29 per month.
